description.value:
You extend your will through your aura, projecting it toward an opponent. Like an unseen weight, your essence clamps down upon theirs, pressing inward until it flickers and falters beneath the strain.

Effect: You target a creature within range, attempting to suppress its aura. Make an Aura-Control check versus your opponent's Will DC. @Check[aura-control|against:will|rollerRole:origin]

  • Success: The target’s aura falters under your pressure, leaving them @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 2}.

  • Critical Success: The target’s aura buckles and collapses, leaving them @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 3}.

  • Failure: The target resists your attempt, and their aura remains unshaken.

Range:

  • Expert: 30 feet.

  • Master: 60 feet.

  • Legendary: 90 feet.

Aura Attack: actions with this trait are subject to a multiple aura-attack penatly accumulated during a turn.
